Load in data:
```{r}
mData<-read.csv("single polyp master with PCoA coordinates.csv") #metabolomics data and xy coords from Ty
mData$ATTRIBUTE_Sample_Name<-as.factor(as.character(mData$ATTRIBUTE_Sample_Name))
mData$ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number<-as.factor(as.character(mData$ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number))
mData<-subset(mData, ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number!="976B")#remove dup

```



# PERMANOVA
```{r}
#PERMANOVA

#sep dfs
mData.sd<-mData[,1:11] #metadata
mData.meta<-mData[,12:566] #metabolomics data
 #mData.PCoA<-mData[,567:568] #ty's x and y, but can't use these for STATS
 #plot(mData.PCoA) #plot Ty's x and y, to confirm your distance matrix cooresponds right

#write.csv(mData.sd,"mData.sd3.csv")
####################### Between colonies and Between Sample points


# Bray-Curtis distance 
mData.dist <- vegdist(mData[,12:566],  method = "bray")
mData.dist.mat<-as.matrix(mData.dist)
 #write.csv(mData.dist.mat, "mData.dist.bc.csv")

PCOA <- pcoa(mData.dist) #pcoa
barplot(PCOA$values$Relative_eig[1:10]) # plot the eigenvalues 
biplot.pcoa(PCOA) #plot
PCOAaxes <- PCOA$vectors[,c(1,2)] #for visualization only

mData.dist2<-as.matrix(mData.dist)

 mData.dist.sd<- inner_join(rownames_to_column(mData.sd), rownames_to_column(data.frame(PCOAaxes)), type = "right", by = "rowname") #merge PCOAaxes and metadata

 
 BetweenColonies_plot<-ggplot(mData.dist.sd, aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = Symbiont.Type), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_manual(values=Sp.colors)+
  #geom_text(label = rownames(scores), nudge_x = 0.05, nudge_y = 0.05,check_overlap = T) +
 # stat_ellipse(aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2, colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), linetype = 2) +
  ggtitle("PCoA Between Colonies") +
  theme_classic();BetweenColonies_plot
 
 metaMDS()
 
 
 
############ plot Between colonies ####

BetweenColonies_plot<-ggplot(mData.dist.sd, aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_manual(values=Sp.colors)+
  #geom_text(label = rownames(scores), nudge_x = 0.05, nudge_y = 0.05,check_overlap = T) +
 # stat_ellipse(aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2, colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), linetype = 2) +
  ggtitle("PCoA Between Colonies") +
  theme_classic();BetweenColonies_plot
       
#PERMANOVA between COLONIES
set.seed(30)
adonis2(mData.dist~ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number, data=mData.sd)

#                          Df SumsOfSqs MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)   
# ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number  18    18.732 1.04064  32.641 0.64527  0.001 ***
# Residuals               323    10.297 0.03188         0.35473           
# Total                   341    29.029                 1.00000     



############# Between Sampling areas (polyps) ########
set.seed(30)
adonis2(mData.dist~Area, data=mData.sd)
#            Df SumsOfSqs  MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)  
# Area        5    0.7291 0.145811  1.7312 0.02511  0.017 *
# Residuals 336   28.3000 0.084226         0.97489         
# Total     341   29.0290                  1.00000    

mData.sd$PolypZone2<-mData.sd$Area #duplicate col
mData.sd$PolypZone2[mData.sd$PolypZone2 == "Touching 1"] <- "Base"
mData.sd$PolypZone2[mData.sd$PolypZone2 == "Touching 2"] <- "Base"
mData.sd$PolypZone2[mData.sd$PolypZone2 == "Midle 1"] <- "Mid"
mData.sd$PolypZone2[mData.sd$PolypZone2 == "Midle 2"] <- "Mid"

adonis2(mData.dist~PolypZone2, data=mData.sd)
pairwise.adonis2(mData.dist, mData.sd$PolypZone2)

mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Base"] <- "1"
mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Touching 1"] <- "2"
mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Touching 2"] <- "3"
mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Midle 1"] <- "4"
mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Midle 2"] <- "5"
mData.sd$Area[mData.sd$Area == "Tip"] <- "6"

pairwise.adonis2(mData.dist, mData.sd$Area)



adonis2(mData.dist~Area*ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number, data=mData.sd)
#                               Df SumsOfSqs MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)    
# Area                           5    0.7291 0.14581   4.864 0.02511  0.001 ***
# ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number       18   18.7315 1.04064  34.712 0.64527  0.001 ***
# Area:ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number  90    2.7332 0.03037   1.013 0.09415  0.445    
# Residuals                    228    6.8353 0.02998         0.23546           
# Total                        341   29.0290                 1.00000    

adonis2(mData.dist~ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number*ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter*Area, data=mData.sd)
# 
#                                                       Df SumsOfSqs MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)
# Area                                                   5    0.7291       0       0 0.02511      1
# ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number                               18   18.7315       1       0 0.64527      1
# ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter                                2    0.1206       0       0 0.00415      1
# Area:ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number                          90    2.7332       0       0 0.09415      1
# Area:ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter                          10    0.2231       0       0 0.00768      1
# ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number:ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter       36    1.7009       0       0 0.05859      1
# Area:ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number:ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter 180    4.7907       0       0 0.16503      1
# Residuals                                              0    0.0000    -Inf         0.00000       
# Total                                                341   29.0290                 1.00000       


adonis2(mData.dist~ATTRIBUTE_Branch_Letter*Area, data=mData.sd)




#Plot: No patterns
BetweenSampArea_plot<-ggplot(mData.dist.sd, aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = Area), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_manual(values=Sp.colors)+
  #geom_text(label = rownames(scores), nudge_x = 0.05, nudge_y = 0.05,check_overlap = T) +
 # stat_ellipse(aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2, colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), linetype = 2) +
  ggtitle("PCoA Between Sampling Area") +
  theme_classic();BetweenSampArea_plot

```
Between polyps 1-3 only
```{r}
# ########################### Between polyps 1-3 only
#subset data
mData.Polyps123<-subset(mData, Area=="Base"|Area=="Touching 1"|Area=="Touching 2")
mData.Polyps123.sd<-mData.Polyps123[,1:11]
# Bray-Curtis distance 
mData.Polyps123.dist <- vegdist(mData.Polyps123[,12:566],  method = "bray")

PCOA <- pcoa(mData.Polyps123.dist) #pcoa
barplot(PCOA$values$Relative_eig[1:10]) # plot the eigenvalues 
biplot.pcoa(PCOA) #plot
PCOAaxes <- PCOA$vectors[,c(1,2)] #for visualization only

 mData.Polyps123.dist.sd<- inner_join(rownames_to_column(mData.Polyps123.sd), rownames_to_column(data.frame(PCOAaxes)), type = "right", by = "rowname") #merge PCOAaxes and metadata


set.seed(30)
adonis2(mData.Polyps123.dist~Area, data=mData.Polyps123.sd)
#            Df SumsOfSqs  MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)
# Area        2    0.0603 0.030125 0.33161 0.00393  0.992
# Residuals 168   15.2620 0.090846         0.99607       
# Total     170   15.3223                  1.00000 


set.seed(30)
adonis2(mData.Polyps123.dist~Area*ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number, data=mData.Polyps123.sd)
#                               Df SumsOfSqs MeanSqs F.Model      R2 Pr(>F)    
# Area                           2    0.0603 0.03013  0.9495 0.00393  0.460    
# ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number       18   10.7537 0.59743 18.8308 0.70183  0.001 ***
# Area:ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number  36    0.8916 0.02477  0.7806 0.05819  0.983    
# Residuals                    114    3.6168 0.03173         0.23605           
# Total                        170   15.3223                 1.00000         


#Plot by Colony number (see that still cluster by colony)
BetweenPoly123_plot<-ggplot(mData.Polyps123.dist.sd, aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_manual(values=Sp.colors)+
  #geom_text(label = rownames(scores), nudge_x = 0.05, nudge_y = 0.05,check_overlap = T) +
 # stat_ellipse(aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2, colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), linetype = 2) +
  ggtitle("PCoA Between Polyps 1-3") +
  theme_classic();BetweenPoly123_plot

#Plot by Polyp number (see that no cluster)
BetweenPoly123_plot2<-ggplot(mData.Polyps123.dist.sd, aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = Area), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_manual(values=Sp.colors)+
  #geom_text(label = rownames(scores), nudge_x = 0.05, nudge_y = 0.05,check_overlap = T) +
 # stat_ellipse(aes(x = Axis.1, y = Axis.2, colour = ATTRIBUTE_Colony_number), linetype = 2) +
  ggtitle("PCoA Between Polyps 1-3 by polyp#") +
  theme_classic();BetweenPoly123_plot2
```

 Models on distance compare
 physical.dist_sq for models
 
```{r}
Dist.compare.df$Coral<-as.factor(as.character(Dist.compare.df$Coral))
mod<-lmer(bc.dist~physical.dist + (1|Coral) + (1|Coral:Branch), data=Dist.compare.df )
anova(mod)
  shapiro.test(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist) #not normal
  shapiro.test(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist) #not normal
ggqqplot(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist, ylab = "bc.dist")
# wt
ggqqplot(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist, ylab = "physical.dist")


#Transform the data
Dist.compare.df<-Dist.compare.df #make a copy
hist(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist)
  Dist.compare.df$bc.dist_log<-log10(1+Dist.compare.df$bc.dist)
  hist(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist_log)
  Dist.compare.df$bc.dist_sqrt<-sqrt(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist)
  hist(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist_sqrt) #looks good use this


hist(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist)
  Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_log<-log10(1+Dist.compare.df$physical.dist)
  hist(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_log)
ggqqplot(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_log, ylab = "phys.dist")

Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_t<-(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist)^1/3
hist(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_t)
ggqqplot(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_t, ylab = "phys.dist")


Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_sq<-sqrt(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist)
hist(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_sq)
Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_cub<-Dist.compare.df$physical.dist^(1/3)
hist(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_cub)
ggqqplot(Dist.compare.df$physical.dist_sq, ylab = "physical.dists")


Dist.mod<-lmer(bc.dist_sqrt~physical.dist_t + (1|Coral) + (1|Coral:Branch), data=Dist.compare.df )
anova(Dist.mod)  # differ
qqPlot(residuals(Dist.mod))  # residuals look good
#physical.dist 0.23483 0.23483     1 817.58  32.727 1.488e-08 ***
```

```{r}
### By polyp zones FIG1H! #########
mod<- lmer(bc.dist_sqrt~PolypZones + (1|Coral/Branch) , data=Dist.compare.df )
anova(mod)
summary(mod)
r.squaredGLMM(mod)
qqPlot(residuals(mod)) # looks good
emm<-emmeans(mod,  ~ PolypZones, adjust="Tukey")
cld(emm)
pairs(emm)

#use this non-parametric Kruskal-Wallis test
kruskal.test(bc.dist ~ PolypZones, data = Dist.compare.df)
pairwise.wilcox.test(Dist.compare.df$bc.dist_sqrt, Dist.compare.df$PolypZones,
                 p.adjust.method = "BH")
```
